author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter KERDI-BOARD and LED niche tips…I cut the boards to dry fit the internal niche dimension. That allows me to ensure the niche is level. Then I outline the 2-inch flange and cut it from the boards. This helps me keep the niche tight in the wall assembly which makes waterproofing easier. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#bathroomremodel #showerremodel #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #sponsored
title: Schluter KERDI-BOARD and LED Niche Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #sponsored
